title: Bibliographic reference concept (ELIXIR-EXCELERATE WP2 Benchmarking schemas)

_id.title: The unique id of the bibliographic reference. It should be something meaningful, like its DOI or its PubMedId

_schema.title: The JSON schema absolute URI. It must match the value of 'id' in the JSON schema

title.title: The title of the referenced material

doi.title: The DOI of the referenced material (in case of books, its ISBN in ISBN-A DOI format)

pubmed_id.title: The PubMed id of the referenced material (if any)

abstract.title: Optionally, the abstract of the referenced material

links.title: Optional links related to the bibliographic reference

uri.title: The URI of the link related to the bibliographic reference

authors.title: Optional list of authors of the referenced material

contact_id.title: If it is a known contact, its contact id
